title: ALPHA-AXON.  Bronze. Silver. Gold. Platinum
body: Looking for people in all tries to join ALPHA-AXON so that we can start a very big club-team very friendly no toxic people no trolls do not have to be good can be any skill level join and have fun :)   Add me and message me   gypsyxslayer.   Alpha-axon   xwellhungx

replies.body:
Seems cool to have one big community to play together.

I'm in. Add me NerdBuster
Would you mind providing more detail into what this actually is? Esports team? Casual ranked club?
It is more like a clan-club but there will be a competitive side and a chill side spending on what you want :)
This sounds cool, i will join :D
